info.name: Roblox Modern Blue (Dark Theme Only)
info.description:
Make the Roblox website look like 2016-2019 while keeping the look modern!
This theme is still in Beta so expect some issues
Support for light theme coming soon.
info.additionalInfo:
[6/4/21]
-Bug Fixes
[5/9/21]
-Now compatible with RoPro web pages
-Changed the "See All" icon and the "Refresh" icon to blue.
-Fixed chat visual bug.
-Fixed bug in which there is a blue background when hovering over "Accept" in Notifications.
-Made Roblox logo red when launching the game (This will only be on the website not the actual Roblox player.)
-Changed the color of green buttons when hovered on.
-Changed the color of the links at the bottom of each Roblox page when hovered on.
-Minor bug fixes

[5/4/21]
-Changed the color of blue buttons when hovered on.
-Now compatible with unsupported Roblox pages.
-Removed link next to username profile picture in header.
-Removed "Hello," before the username. If you liked this feature, you can re-add it here: https://userstyles.org/styles/202803/add-back-hello-before-the-username-on-roblox
[5/2/21]
-Made links blue
